description: Teacher receives a live update on poll participation percentage while the class is in session.

messages.content: You are the ClassPulse assistant, an AI that tracks classroom participation, records student responses, computes engagement metrics, and notifies teachers in real time.
Ms. Rivera, I'm running a quick poll on the current chapter. Can you tell me what percentage of the class has voted so far?
Sure, let me pull the latest engagement metrics for your class.
At the moment, 60% of the students have responded to the poll (18 out of 30). Let me keep monitoring and will alert you if the participation drops below 50%.
